DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate overall comfort AIR OPTIX® COLORS compare FRESHLOOK® COLORBLENDS habitual wearer FRESHLOOK® COLORBLENDS .
DOC.brief_title: A Comparison AIR OPTIX® COLORS Versus FRESHLOOK® COLORBLENDS
DOC.criteria: Able willing sign Informed Consent document . If legal age consent , legally authorize representative must sign also Informed Consent document . Able achieve visual acuity least 20/30 ( Snellen ) eye distance contact lenses best correct visual acuity ( BCVA ) ≥ 20/25 eye . Manifest cylinder less equal 0.75 diopter ( within previous year ) eye . Successful wear FRESHLOOK® COLORBLENDS spherical soft contact lenses eye ( protocolspecified color ) past three month minimum 5 day per week 8 hour per day . History least 5 day successful use lens ( minimum 8 hours/day ) one protocolspecified lens care solutions/multipurpose solution ( MPS ) . Other protocolspecified inclusion criterion may apply . Any ocular systemic medical condition may , opinion investigator , preclude safe administration test article affect result study . Wears habitual lens extend wear modality ( sleep lens overnight / removing lens daily basis ) . Monovision , monocular ( one eye functional vision ) fit one lens . History intolerance hypersensitivity component test article . Use overthecounter prescribe topical ocular medication within previous 7 day ( exclude rewetting drop ) . Moderate severe corneal edema , corneal vascularization , corneal staining , injection , tarsal abnormality , `` '' complication ; corneal infiltrates . Current history ocular infection , severe inflammation , disease within previous 6 month . Any systemic disease ( include allergy , respiratory infection cold ) may affect eye exacerbate use contact lenses contact lens solution . Participation investigational clinical study within previous 30 day . Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
